verses.verse: (A Prayer of Moses the man of God.) <S%H136>Lord,<s%> Thou hast <S%H1961>been<s%> our <S%H4583>dwelling<s%> <S%H4583>place<s%> in <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations.<s%>

<S%H2962>Before<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> were <S%H3205>born,<s%> Or Thou didst <S%H9123>give<s%> <S%H9123>birth<s%> to the <S%H776>earth<s%> and the <S%H8398>world,<s%> Even from <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> to <S%H5769>everlasting,<s%> Thou art <S%H410>God.<s%>
Thou dost <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H582>man<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> into <S%H9085>dust,<s%> And dost <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H7725>"Return,<s%> O <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men.<s%>"

For a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in Thy <S%H5869>sight<s%> Are like <S%H3117>yesterday<s%> <S%H8543><s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> it <S%H5674>passes<s%> by, Or [as] a <S%H821>watch<s%> in the <S%H3915>night.<s%>

Thou hast <S%H2229>swept<s%> them <S%H2229>away<s%> <S%H2229>like<s%> a <S%H2229>flood,<s%> they <S%H1961>fall<s%> <S%H8142>asleep;<s%> In the <S%H1242>morning<s%> they are like <S%H2682>grass<s%> which <S%H2498>sprouts<s%> <S%H2498>anew.<s%>
In the <S%H1242>morning<s%> it <S%H6692>flourishes,<s%> and <S%H2498>sprouts<s%> <S%H2498>anew;<s%> Toward <S%H6153>evening<s%> it <S%H9268>fades,<s%> and <S%H3001>withers<s%> away.
For we have <S%H3615>been<s%> <S%H3615>consumed<s%> by Thine <S%H639>anger,<s%> And by Thy <S%H2534>wrath<s%> we have been <S%H926>dismayed.<s%>
Thou hast <S%H7896>placed<s%> our <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> Thee, Our <S%H5956>secret<s%> [sins] in the <S%H3974>light<s%> of Thy <S%H6440>presence.<s%>
For <S%H3605>all<s%> our <S%H3117>days<s%> have <S%H6437>declined<s%> in Thy <S%H5678>fury;<s%> We have <S%H3615>finished<s%> our <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> a <S%H1899>sigh.<s%>

As for the <S%H3117>days<s%> of our <S%H8141>life,<s%> they contain <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> Or <S%H518>if<s%> due to <S%H1369>strength,<s%> <S%H8084>eighty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> Yet their <S%H7296>pride<s%> is [but] <S%H5999>labor<s%> and <S%H205>sorrow;<s%> For <S%H2440>soon<s%> it is <S%H1468>gone<s%> and we <S%H5774>fly<s%> <S%H5774>away.<s%>
<S%H4310>Who<s%> <S%H3045>understands<s%> the <S%H5797>power<s%> of Thine <S%H639>anger,<s%> And Thy <S%H5678>fury,<s%> according to the <S%H3374>fear<s%> that is due Thee?
<S%H3651>So<s%> <S%H3045>teach<s%> us to <S%H4487>number<s%> our <S%H3117>days,<s%> That we may <S%H935>present<s%> to Thee a <S%H3824>heart<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%>
Do <S%H7725>return,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> <S%H4970>how<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> <S%H4970><s%> [will it be]? And be <S%H5162>sorry<s%> for Thy <S%H5650>servants.<s%>

O <S%H7646>satisfy<s%> us in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> with Thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness,<s%> That we may <S%H7442>sing<s%> for <S%H7442>joy<s%> and be <S%H8055>glad<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> our <S%H3117>days.<s%>
<S%H8055>Make<s%> us <S%H8055>glad<s%> according to the <S%H3117>days<s%> Thou hast <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> us, [And] the <S%H8141>years<s%> we have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H9567>evil.<s%>
Let Thy <S%H6467>work<s%> <S%H7200>appear<s%> to Thy <S%H5650>servants,<s%> And Thy <S%H1926>majesty<s%> to their <S%H1121>children.<s%>

And let the <S%H5278>favor<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> be upon us; And do <S%H3559>confirm<s%> for us the <S%H4639>work<s%> of our <S%H3027>hands;<s%> Yes, <S%H3559>confirm<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of our <S%H3027>hands.<s%>
